title: 108. The Idea of India with Sunil Khilnani
itunes:title: 108. The Idea of India with Sunil Khilnani
description: How do ideas travel across the world? How do ideas change? Why do they change? This week, we contemplate these questions in the mid-century context of the emerging Indian nation-state in the 1950s into the contemporary cultural climate we see today. Sunil Khilnani is professor of politics and history at Ashoka University and author of the book The Idea of India.
